item.title: Combined Easter Service
item.dc:creator: Vinay Oommen
item.description:
A combined Easter Service will be held at 6:00 pm in the Scudder Auditorium at the Bagayam Campus. Fellowship refreshments: 5:00 pm Scudder Hall.

The post Combined Easter Service appeared first on Campus Events.
item.content:encoded:
A combined Easter Service will be held at 6:00 pm in the Scudder Auditorium at the Bagayam Campus. Fellowship refreshments: 5:00 pm Scudder Hall.

item.title: Easter Program for Domestic helpers
item.dc:creator: Vinay Oommen
item.description:
An Easter Day Program for Domestic Helpers working in the college campus is being arranged on 1st April, 2023 between 3-5 pm in the college chapel. Please inform and encourage your helpers to attend the same. – Organizing Team

The post Easter Program for Domestic helpers appeared first on Campus Events.
item.content:encoded:
An Easter Day Program for Domestic Helpers working in the college campus is being arranged on 1st April, 2023 between 3-5 pm in the college chapel. Please inform and encourage your helpers to attend the same. – Organizing Team

The post Easter Program for Domestic helpers appeared first on Campus Events.
